title: My Mother Died Today
content:
She was 90 and had been having heart problems for the past 30 years. It wasn't unexpected yet, even when you think you have prepared yourself for the inevitable, you are caught unprepared. Her mind was sharp till the end and her sense of humor still shined through. We will miss her.

Chris
author: dezcom

comments.content: Our warmest condolences, Chris. Best to you and your family.
I'm sorry for your loss, Chris. You knew her all your life! I hope that you can spend time over the next few days remembering all of the good times you shared with her. There must have been so many.

I'm so sorry, Chris! But I'm glad you had that many years with your mom.

-------------------------------------  
_Inventor of the DVD rewinder_
My deepest sympathies Chris. It is a blessing that she was sharp and able to appreciate her family for so long.
It's always hard to loose a loved one and especially your mother. My condolences to you and your family, Chris.

hi,
